parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the custom rule.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the custom rule.

parameters.name: RuleId
parameters.description:
The ID of the watermark rule.

>  You can obtain the rule ID by checking the value of the RuleId parameter that is returned by the [AddLiveStreamWatermarkRule](~~2848100~~) operation.

parameters.name: TemplateId
parameters.description:
The ID of the watermark template.

>  You can obtain the template ID by checking the value of the TemplateId parameter that is returned by the [AddLiveStreamWatermark](~~2848096~~) operation.
